alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EASTERN CARLTON COUNTY THROUGH 815 PM CDT... At 744 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Fond Du Lac Band Sawyer Area, to near Mahtowa, to 6 miles northeast of Willow River, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mahtowa around 750 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Fond Du Lac Band Cloquet Area, Nemadji, Cloquet, Scanlon, Carlton, Wrenshall and Thomson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
